data.enText: large, heavy guns which are often moved on wheels

data.chText: 该市镇处于密集的炮火之下。
data.enText: The town is under heavy artillery fire.
the section of an army trained to use these guns

tr: a means of persuading or arguing
example: he used all his conversational weapons

tr: an army unit that uses big guns

value.def: Artillery consists of large, powerful guns which are transported on wheels and used by an army.

example.ex: Using tanks and heavy artillery, they seized the town.
example.tran: 他们倚仗坦克和重型火炮占领了这个镇。

value.def: The artillery is the section of an army which is trained to use large, powerful guns.

example.ex: At some stage he left the Artillery to command a radar unit.
example.tran: 有段时间他离开了炮兵部队去指挥一支雷达小分队。
